text: That's the real secret to job creation - not borrowing and spending more money in Washington.
author: Paul Ryan

text: We need to stop spending money we don't have.
author: Paul Ryan

text: What did the taxpayers get out of the Obama stimulus? More debt. That money wasn't just spent and wasted - it was borrowed, spent, and wasted.
author: Paul Ryan

text: A runner must run with dreams in his heart, not money in his pocket.
author: Emil Zatopek

text: I'm free of stress and worries now because if I don't like something I'm doing, I just find the fun in it instead of being miserable. Let me have fun with the people I work with, let me have fun making money - when I grew up so poor, ya know?
author: Jenny McCarthy
